characters.label: The Insider
characters.visual_prompt: A trendy, tech-savvy young adult male, late 20s, wearing a modern streetwear hoodie, holding a smartphone up, looking conspiratorial and excited, finger over lips in a 'shh' gesture, studio lighting, sharp focus, isolated on white background, 8k resolution, photorealistic.

locations.label: Luxury Residential District (Aerial)
locations.visual_prompt: High-angle satellite view of a lush, high-end residential neighborhood with large villas and swimming pools, bright daylight, crisp textures, photorealistic aerial photography style, 8k.

locations.label: Digital City Interface
locations.visual_prompt: A futuristic 3D isometric map of a city, clean UI design, buildings are white and grey, streets are dark, optimized for data overlays, cinematic lighting.

objects.label: Smartphone with App UI
objects.visual_prompt: A sleek, modern bezel-less smartphone held by a hand, screen displaying a digital map application with a clean interface, isolated on white background, high-end product photography.

objects.label: Data Floating UI Elements
objects.visual_prompt: Futuristic Augmented Reality UI pop-ups, displaying 'Price: $5M', 'Freehold', 'Land Size: 5000sqft', glowing neon blue and green text boxes, semi-transparent backgrounds, isolated on white background.

frames.description: Close up of The Insider looking into the camera, whispering the hook.
frames.visual_prompt: Close-up shot of character c1 (The Insider) leaning into the camera lens, holding a smartphone (o1) near his face, finger over lips, dramatic lighting casting a slight shadow over eyes to create mystery, depth of field blurring the background.

frames.description: Fast zoom transition from space/clouds down to the Luxury Residential District.
frames.visual_prompt: Motion-blurred zoom effect crashing down from clouds into location l1 (Luxury Residential District), speed lines on edges, satellite imagery style, shifting from 2D map to 3D reality.

frames.description: POV of phone screen selecting a plot of land. The map transforms from a standard view to a detailed cadastral map.
frames.visual_prompt: POV shot holding object o1 (Smartphone), screen displays location l2 (Digital City Interface). A finger taps a specific building, and the building glows gold. The surrounding area is desaturated to highlight the selection.

frames.description: Augmented Reality data explosion. Detailed info cards pop up over the building.
frames.visual_prompt: Cinematic 3D render of a luxury house from location l1. Floating around it are object o2 (Data Floating UI Elements) showing 'Ownership: Private', 'Last Transacted: $4.2M'. The data connects to the house with thin glowing lines. Iron Man HUD style.

frames.description: Heat map overlay spreading across the city district.
frames.visual_prompt: Wide shot of location l2 (Digital City Interface). A gradient heat map overlay spreads across the buildings—red for high value, blue for lower value. The buildings are translucent 3D models. Visualizing big data.

frames.description: The 'God Mode' visual metaphor. The user holding the city in their hand.
frames.visual_prompt: Surreal composite image. A giant hand (belonging to c1) holding a glowing miniature version of the city (l2) in the palm. Soft god-rays shining down from above. Text overlay: 'GOD MODE' in bold, cinematic font.

frames.description: Final CTA. The Insider pointing to the bio/description.
frames.visual_prompt: Medium shot of character c1 (The Insider) smiling confidently, holding the phone (o1) forward showing the app logo, while pointing upward/to the side with the other hand indicating 'Link in Bio'. Bright, high-key studio lighting.
